p: The present research work was performed in the chemistry laboratory, Department of Chemistry, University of Management and Technology, Lahore. All the chemicals used were of analytical grade and available commercially. The chemicals used in the research work were purchased from Merck (Darmstadt, Germany) and Sigma Chemicals Co. (St. Louis, MS, USA). The commercially available Oleic acid-coated Cr 2O 3 nanoparticles were purchased with a 18 nm size for comparative biological analysisâ€”these nanoparticles are named as chemically synthesized nanoparticles.
